text: @ScrambledAdams I did so want you all to care for me, as an afterthought, to see if she could take a fancy to me.

passages.fragment: I did so want you all to care for me , as
passages.full_quote: "<used>I did so want you all to care for me, as</used> I do for you, and now I care for you more than ever," said Anna, with tears in her eyes

passages.fragment: for me , as an afterthought , to see if
passages.full_quote: M. Giraud sent <used>for me, as an afterthought, to see if</used> I could identify the man in there.

passages.fragment: , to see if she could take a fancy to me
passages.full_quote: Miss Havisham had sent for me<used>, to see if she could take a fancy to me</used>
